      • mapToKeysAndResults

        public org.json.JSONObject mapToKeysAndResults(java.util.Map data,
                                      java.lang.String keyLabel,
                                      java.lang.String resultLabel)
        Creates a JSON object from an HashMap. The keys will be listed separately.
        Parameters:
        data - The HashMap which contains the data of the Object
        keyLabel - The name which will be used
        resultLabel - The label of the results.
        Returns:
        The newly created JSON Object.
